sentences.en: The song of the oyster, though not silenced , was diminuendo amore.
sentences.cn: 牡蛎之歌, 虽然还未沉寂,已渐唱渐弱.

sentences.en: The song of the oyster, though not silenced , was diminuendo con amore.
sentences.cn: 牡蛎之歌虽未沉寂, 但已渐唱渐弱.

trans.tran_en: a part in a piece of music where it becomes gradually quieter
